div.p:
In the name of the Lord God Everlasting Amen. I Alexander
Simpson of Port Tobacco in the province of Maryland planter being at this
present time very sick and weak but of sound and perfect memory blessed be
God for the same do make appoint and ordain to be my last will
and testament hereby working Disannulling & making void all other will
and testemenat by me thereforeafter made either by word or writing
following & ordaining this sole my lasy will and testament and no other
whatsoever.

I commint my soul into the hand of God that gave it hoping through
the miracle of my dear Lord and savior Jesus Christ for a glorious resurrection
and my body to the ground to buried in decent manner according to the
will & discussion of my Executor underneath specified and for all my
worldly goods I do give and bequeath them in manner and form following
after my true and lawful debts that I have to any person or persons bewill
and truly paid satisfied & discharged.

Item I do fully & bequeath unto my God Daughter Margret Mahol daughter of Arehball
Wahol all that dividend or parcel of land lying between her fathers plantation and the plantation that I now live upon by estimation one hundred and twenty acres to have and to hould to her and her heirs forever but if the said Margrett Mahol die without heirs lawfully begotten of her body then I do give the above said hundred twenty acres of land to her sister Elizabeth Mahol to have & to hould to her and her heirs forever.
